children.label: Damages recovery for indirect purchasers
children.query: (direct OR indirect) w/2 purchas* AND recover* AND damages

children.label: M&A Notification Report Form
children.query: notification w/5 form AND (acquisition OR merger)

children.label: Prosecution For Monopolization
children.query: monopol* AND fine OR (prison OR imprisonment)

children.label: Disclosure Requirements For Private Education Loans
children.query: credit* OR disclos* AND "private education loan"

children.label: Insurance Data Security
children.query: Insurance w/p (data security OR security program)

children.label: Privacy Of Biometric Information
children.query: biometric w/p (privacy OR disclosure) OR facial recognition

children.label: Privacy Policy Requirements
children.query: security AND privacy policy w/p (business OR agent OR agency OR licensee OR operator OR broker)

children.label: Climate Change
children.query: climate w/5 change OR related AND risk OR emissions

children.label: Water Pollution Penalties
children.query: water protection OR water pollution OR clean water w/p penalt*

children.label: HIPAA Breach Notification
children.query: (HIPAA OR "protected health information") AND breach AND (notify OR notification OR notice OR report OR reporting)

children.label: Telehealth For Treatment Of Substance Use Disorder
Injunctive Relief For Trade Secret Misappropriation
Remedies For Patent Infringement
children.query: patent infring* AND damage OR remed*

children.label: Seizure Or Destruction Of Counterfeit Goods
children.query: counterfeit* w/p goods OR products w/p seizure OR destruction

children.label: Unauthorized Use Of Images And Photographs
children.query: image OR photograph AND unauthorized w/p use OR fixat* OR distrib* OR perform*

children.label: Unauthorized Use Of Sound Recordings
children.query: Sound w/3 recording AND unauthorized w/p use OR fixat* OR distrib* OR perform*

children.label: Applicant Salary Disclosure Requirements
children.query: applicant AND disclos* w/5 salary OR compensation OR wage

children.label: Employment Discrimination Based On Appearance
children.query: employ* AND (dress OR groom* OR attire OR hair*) discriminat*

children.label: Paid Time Off For Family And Medical Leave
children.query: employ* AND paid AND leave AND time w/5 family AND medical

children.label: Pregnancy Accommodation Requirements
children.query: employ* AND pregnan* w/10 (accommodation OR obligation OR requirement)

children.label: Board Diversity & Inclusion
children.query: corporat* AND board OR executive AND diversity OR inclusion AND gender OR racial OR lgbtq OR "underrepresented communities"

children.label: Stock Option Compensation
children.query: "stock option" AND equity OR compensation AND exempt*

children.label: Business Deduction For Losses Due To Fraud Or Embezzlement
children.query: business and deduction w/20 (fraud OR theft OR embezzl*)

children.label: Deducting Net Operating Losses From Real Estate
Deduction Of Organizational Start-Up Expenses
children.query: deduction AND "start up" AND expense AND (business OR organization)

children.label: Income Tax Evasion
children.query: evad* OR avoid w/p income tax

children.label: Residency Time Requirement For Dependency Exemption
children.query: dependen* w/3 exemption AND (residen* OR abode) AND months

children.label: Wrongful Death And Survival Actions Damages
Autonomous Vehicle Insurance Requirements
children.query: "autonomous vehicle" OR "self driving vehicle" AND insurance

children.label: Operation Of Autonomous Vehicles
children.query: "autonomous vehicle" OR "self driving vehicle" AND operation*

children.label: Property Restrictions for Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAVs)
